title: On the Catechising of the Uninstructed
author: Augustine

paragraphs.text: On the Catechising of the Uninstructed

references.text: The Oxford Library and H. de Romestin translate the title: On Instructing the Unlearned.-P. S.

paragraphs.text: Translated by Rev. S. D. F. Salmond, D.D., Professor of Systematic Theology, Free Church College, Aberdeen.
